attributes.action: Stop mobile and broadband company's putting up the prices while in your contract
attributes.additional_details: It needs to stop mobile phone and broadband company's shouldn't be allowed to do it
attributes.background: It's unacceptable that mobile and broadband company's are allowed to put there prices up while your in your contract it needs to stop

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Ban charges increasing during fixed-term contracts
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649566
